text: Eric Agyemang (born 11 January 1980) is a German former professional footballer who played as a forward. ==Career== Agyemang was born in Obuasi, Ghana. On 10 April 2010, he scored his first hat-trick in Germany for Erzgebirge Aue against VfL Osnabr√ºck. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Arminia Bielefeld players
